metadata.title: CVE-2023-2463 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in Full Screen Mode in Google Chrome onAndroid prior to 113.0.5672.63 allowed a remote attacker to hide thecontents of the Omnibox (URL bar) via a crafted HTML page. (Chromiumsecurity severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
